timeline.bodyText: I couldn't reproduce the bug, I'm adding a comment to the JIRA ticket. If it is a bug, we'll need a test to confirm that it's fixed.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: As mentioned in the description, the issue was flagged by Sameera after the failure of test com.marklogic.bootstrap.DataHubInstallTest.testProjectScaffolding() in Jenkins. I was able to reproduce this failure in my local machine. The added fix resolved the failure and the test passed. I will look into the comment in JIRA ticket
replies.author: srinathgit

replies.bodyText:
Hmm, it's odd that this is failing in that test but not when I test the code against a real project.
Can you add a test or assertion to HubConfigImplTest to verify this and use the assertion message for why it's being done? It's good to have a targeted unit test for a change like this, as no one will ever know that it's being verified by a broad-ranging test like DataHubInstallTest.
replies.author: rjrudin
